body_html: @alextp this is as good as it gets. The two failures are unrelated issues. Windows Bazel GPU fails to build because of a missing file (nccl.so) and XLA fails in the Log test, which is unaffected by this PR. In my opinion, this PR is ready for merge.

body: @alextp this is as good as it gets. The two failures are unrelated issues. Windows Bazel GPU fails to build because of a missing file (nccl.so) and XLA fails in the Log test, which is unaffected by this PR. In my opinion, this PR is ready for merge.
